participant_1.background:
My worst experience was when I was in a car accident and my family and I were all injured.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i hate the taste of fish.
i am really short.
i am a happy person.

participant_2.background:
I've been learning to cope with my OCD better and it's been helping me to live a more fulfilling life.
I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals.
I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands.

content.text: Hi there, my name is Michelle.
Nice to meet you, Michelle. I'm [user 1's name].
It's nice to meet you too, [user 1's name]. What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
That sounds nice. I like to read too, especially fairytales. They're a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
I agree. I've been trying to learn how to cope with my OCD better, and reading fairytales has really helped me to relax.
That's great to hear. I'm glad you've found something that helps you to cope.
Thanks. I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I know what you mean. I have two kids of my own, and it can be tough to find time for everything.
Yeah, it's hard to balance everything.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I've always been curious about what they could tell me.
I've been to a few, and they've always been pretty accurate. But I don't believe in them too much. I think our future is in our own hands.
I agree. I think we create our own destinies.
